com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles

Interface StyleHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CellFormatDataFormatHandler, FormatHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStyleHandler, CellStyleHandler, ColumnRowCellStyleHandler, ColumnRowStyleHandler, DifferentialStyleHandler, NewStyleHandler, OdsStyleHandler, RangeStyleHandler, StyleHandlerImpl

    public interface StyleHandler
extends CellFormatDataFormatHandler
    Represents a handler for cell formatting which is used to decouple CellStyle type from the cell format data in the underlying storage.

      • isDefault

        boolean isDefault()
        Gets a value indicating whether resolved cell formatting is default (all formatting groups are null and referenced style is 'Normal').
        Returns:
        true if resolved cell formatting is default; otherwise, false.

      • setCellFormatData

        void setCellFormatData(CellFormatData value,
                       EnumSet<CellFormatFlags> flags)
        Sets the cell formatting with specific formatting flags. If formatting flag is off, current formatting is used; otherwise, formatting from the input cell formatting is used.

        Input cell formatting can be null, in which case it is replaced with empty formatting associated with the handler's workbook (default cell formatting which inherits all from 'Normal' style).

        If input cell formatting is from the another workbook or it is not attached to any workbook, it is imported.

        Input cell formatting is either cached / frozen or cloned (modifying it later won't make any changes in the underlying storage).

        Parameters:
        value - The cell formatting.
        flags - The cell formatting flags.
